docs.title: ESP32 MCU EDGE INTELLIGENCE NODE
docs.text: This project dedicates to the development of a MCU edge intelligence node based on ESP32. If you are interested in this project, please star it and stay tuned.

docs.title: SOFTWARE ARCHITECTURE
docs.text: PHYSICAL LAYER -> DRIVER LAYER -> MIDWARE LAYER -> APPLICATION LAYER

docs.title: DEV TOOLCHAIN
docs.text:
TOOLCHAIN DESCRIPTION PROS CONS ESP_IDF Espressif IoT Development Framework Rich in features, good documentation Steep learning curve MICROPYTHON Python for microcontrollers Easy to learn, rapid development Limited resources ARDUINO Open-source electronics platform Easy to use, large community Limited resources

Note

For rapid prototyping, we use MICROPYTHON; for high-performance applications, we use ESP_IDF.

docs.title: ESP32微控制器边缘智能节点
docs.text: 这个项目致力于基于ESP32的微控制器边缘智能节点的开发。如果你对这个项目感兴趣，请给它点个赞并保持关注。

docs.title: 硬件架构
docs.text: 主控 + 感知 + 通信 + 交互

docs.title: 软件架构
docs.text: 物理层 -> 驱动层 -> 中间件层 -> 应用层

docs.title: 开发工具链
docs.text:
工具链 描述 优势 劣势 ESP_IDF Espressif IoT Development Framework 功能丰富，文档完善 学习曲线陡 MICROPYTHON Python for microcontrollers 易学，开发迅速 资源有限 ARDUINO 开源电子平台 易用，社区庞大 资源有限

Note

对于快速原型设计，我们使用 MICROPYTHON；对于高性能应用，我们使用 ESP_IDF。
